ack.p: We would like to thank Liliana Benitez, Zobia Chanda, Laney Davidson, Zadok Jollie, and Shannon Regan for assistance with the experiment, Joe Robb for research guidance at Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Simon Riley for assistance with the statistical analysis, and Brett Lane, Erica Goss, Robert Holt, Michael Barfield, Nicholas Kortessis, Margaret Simon, Christopher Wojan, and Keith Clay for discussions about the experiment and manuscript.
